interest_drivers: Emergence of nano models in AI
Model Context Protocol (MCP) for workflow optimization
Benchmarking of LLMs for real dev tasks
ai_analysis.summary: The introduction of nano models and their potential impact on AI, along with the discussion of Model Context Protocol (MCP) and benchmarking of LLMs, suggests notable technical advances and useful tools in the AI/ML space, with moderate business impact through potential workflow optimizations and market expansion.

ai_analysis.summary: Pieces introduces a range of features leveraging on-device AI, context awareness, and long-term memory to enhance productivity for software development teams, showcasing notable technical innovation and potential business impact.

changes.title: Features — Pieces for Developers
changes.content_preview:
Title: Features — Pieces for Developers

Download for free

Pieces Features

Discover Pieces’ features – on-device AI with context awareness and long-term memory to streamline your work.

Download Pieces for free

Pieces Long-Term Memory

Ask about everything you are doing on your machine with full control over privacy.

Learn more

Pieces Copilot

AI copilot that knows what you know, not just what the LLM knows

Learn more

Pieces Drive

Save and manage your workflow wherever you are, all augmented automatically by AI. Share your files and projects with your team.

Learn more

Pieces where you are

Avoid context switching by interacting with Pieces in the tools you already know and love across Windows, Linux, and macOS.

Learn more

Take actions with other features

With hundreds of tools competing for your attention, Pieces is the OS-level AI companion redefining productivity for software development teams.

ai_analysis.summary: Pieces for Developers introduces an innovative approach to automated memory capture and contextual search, potentially enhancing developer workflow efficiency. While not a breakthrough AI model, it demonstrates significant technical advances and notable business impact through its user base and cross-app integration capabilities.

changes.title: Pieces for Developers — Long term memory for your developer workstream
changes.content_preview:
Title: Pieces for Developers — Long term memory for your developer workstream

The easiest way to never forget anything

What you did, in what app and when – saved automatically. Pieces helps you remember everything, without trying. 

Download for free

150,000+ high-performing developers at top companies build with Pieces

It starts with memory⸺at the OS-Level
We memorize everything you work on

Automatically forms memories of what matters – code, docs, chats, and more – right in your workflow, without interruption.

Context you can return to

Every saved tab, message, or snippet stays linked to the bigger picture – so you can pick up right where you left off.

Access your memories when it matters
9 months of memories

Use time-based queries to find exactly what you need.

Search naturally

Choose from leading cloud and local providers or use your own key.

Control your memories

Pieces works across all the apps you are using, capturing context as you go.

Real-Time Context for your f

ai_analysis.summary: Pieces for Developers introduces an innovative approach to automated memory capture and contextual search, potentially enhancing developer workflow efficiency. While not a breakthrough AI model, it demonstrates significant technical advances and notable business impact through its user base and cross-app integration capabilities.

interest_drivers: Integration with multiple code editors and collaboration tools
Support for various LLMs (OpenAI, Anthropic, Ollama etc.)
ai_analysis.summary: Pieces for Developers introduces a novel Long-Term Memory technology, enhancing developer workflow and productivity. The platform offers individual and team plans, with features like context tracking, Copilot assistance, and support for multiple LLMs, showcasing significant technical innovation and notable business impact.

changes.title: Pricing — Pieces for Developers
changes.content_preview:
Title: Pricing — Pieces for Developers

pricing

Supercharge Your Development Workflow with Pieces

By leveraging our pioneering Long-Term Memory technology, Pieces remembers your past work, anticipates your needs, and helps you stay focused.

FREE

Individual

Keep track of your work across browsers, code editors, and collaboration tools.

9 months of individual context

Basic Copilot assistance

Email support

Download the desktop app for

Teams

Shared Memory Across Teams: Enable your team to share insights, context, and knowledge without ever losing the thread.

9 months of team context

Bring your own model or choose preferred LLMs (OpenAI, Anthropic, Ollama etc.)

Priority support (Phone and email)

Contact for pricing

Questions?
We have the answers.

Is my data secure?

Yes! We process data locally where possible, and will never use your data for anything. Learn more.

How can I ensure Long-Term Memory doesn’t send my private details to the cloud?

Can I turn the Long-Term Memo
